sentences.sContent: They apply project management knowledge, skills, and processes in different orders and degrees of rigor to achieve the desired project performance.
sentences.sContent_eng: They apply project management knowledge, skills, and processes in different orders and degrees of rigor to achieve the desired project performance.
sentences.sCn: 他们通过应用不同顺序与严格程度的项目管理知识、技能和过程，来达到项目理想的效果。

sentences.sContent: 'It's really important that we capture all these ideas, but that we wrap a little bit of rigor around them it can't be a glorified suggestion box, ' he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: 'It's really important that we capture all these ideas, but that we wrap a little bit of rigor around them it can't be a glorified suggestion box, ' he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说：我们获得所有这些想法非常重要，但我们在这些想法上加了一点严厉的要求──光是个表面光鲜的意见箱可不行。

words.tran: 严格的；僵硬的，死板的；坚硬的；精确的
严格的，严厉的；严密的；严酷的
严格地；坚硬地；严厉地；牢牢地
